input.sentences: i went to the library yesterday .
they had a lot of new books .
there were some information boards posted .
i stayed there for a while .
eventually all my friends showed up .
output.sentences: Yesterday i stopped at the library.
There were a lot of books to choose from.
I read some information posted on the boards.
I stayed for a while reading and relaxing.
Eventually my friends joined me and it was fun.
